```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(tidyverse)
library(here)
library(janitor)
```

Read in the lionfish data
```{r}
lionfish <- read.csv(here("data", "lionfish", "lionfish_data.csv")) %>% 
  clean_names()
```

Read in the reserve data
```{r}
reserve <- read_csv(here("data", "marine_reserves", "fish_data.csv"))
```
